description.en: A magitek knight of the Gestahlian Empire. The magic with which he was artificially infused cost him his sanity. He committed a number of atrocities as the emperor's confidant、 but forsook the emperor after gaining the power of the Warring Triad. He rules the world through fear.
description.jp:
魔導の力が注入されたガストラ帝国直属
の人造魔導士。人工的に魔力を
注入された影響で精神の均衡を
失っている。皇帝の腹心として
残虐非道な作戦で多くの生命を奪って
いたが「三闘神」の力を得るに至って
皇帝に離反。世界を恐怖で支配する。

desc.en:
3-HIT magic BRV + HP attack
Greater BRV damage to debuffed targets
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV\Moderate chance to BREAK target
Low Action Delay
Inflicts [Sneering Clown] for 6 turns
Extends granted buffs by 2 turns
Turns [BRV Attack], [Meteor] becomes [Meteor+]
　∟ 6-HIT magic BRV attack

[Sneering Clown] has the following effects:
• Lowers Attack, Defense and Speed
• Steals BRV every turn (Sap effect)
desc.gl:
3-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack
Deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Fair chance of inflicting Break
Target: 6 turns Sneering Clown
Extends own active buff duration 2 turns
High turn rate
BRV Attack, Meteor become Meteor+ after use
desc.jp:
3HIT魔法BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
弱体効果が付与された対象に より大きなBRVダメージ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
中確率で対象をブレイクする
対象に6ACTION「嘲笑う道化師」付与
自身に付与されている強化効果を2ACTION延長
行動負荷が低い
使用後 通常「BRV攻撃」または「メテオ」が「メテオ＋」に変化

desc.en:
「Trine」 use +2

When using 「Trine」:
- Becomes AoE
- HP damage is split equally amongst all enemies
- Triggers 4 magic BRV hits after BRV multiplier
- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Lowers Action Delay

When attacking a debuffed target:
- Becomes 「Trine+」
　∟ Moderately raises BRV potency
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV

・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する

name.jp: 裁きの光エクステンド

desc.en:
「Light of Judgment」 use +3

When using 「Light of Judgment」:
- BRV attack hit count becomes 4
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency
- Becomes AoE
- HP damage is split equally amongst all enemies
- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
- Lowers Action Delay
- Slightly improves 「Attack Down」, 「Defense Down」 and 「Speed Down」
- Extends duration of inflicted debuffs by 1 turn
- Grants 「Medium Attack Up」 for 6 turns

When attacking an debuffed target:
- Becomes 「Light of Judgment+」
　∟ Moderately raises BRV potency
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV

・行動負荷ダウン
・「攻撃力ダウン」「防御力ダウン」「素早さダウン」の
　効果小アップ
